title: Creates the felonies of aggravated vehicular assault and vehicular murder
summary: Creates the felonies of aggravated vehicular assault and vehicular murder, to be Class C and Class B felonies, respectively.
fulltext:
S T A T E   O F   N E W   Y O R K
       ________________________________________________________________________

                                          568

                              2011-2012 Regular Sessions

                                   I N  S E N A T E

                                      (PREFILED)

                                    January 5, 2011
                                      ___________

       Introduced  by  Sen.  ROBACH -- read twice and ordered printed, and when
         printed to be committed to the Committee on Codes

       AN ACT to amend the penal  law,  in  relation  to  aggravated  vehicular
         assault and vehicular murder

         THE  PEOPLE OF THE STATE OF NEW YORK, REPRESENTED IN SENATE AND ASSEM-
       BLY, DO ENACT AS FOLLOWS:

    1    Section 1.  The penal law is amended by adding a new section 120.09 to
    2  read as follows:
    3  S 120.09 AGGRAVATED VEHICULAR ASSAULT.
    4    A PERSON IS GUILTY OF AGGRAVATED VEHICULAR ASSAULT WHEN HE  RECKLESSLY
    5  CAUSES SERIOUS PHYSICAL INJURY TO ANOTHER PERSON BY OPERATION OF A VEHI-
    6  CLE  IN  VIOLATION  OF  SUBDIVISION TWO, THREE OR FOUR OF SECTION ELEVEN
    7  HUNDRED NINETY-TWO OF THE VEHICLE AND TRAFFIC LAW OR BY OPERATION  OF  A
    8  VESSEL  OR  PUBLIC VESSEL IN VIOLATION OF PARAGRAPH (B), (C), (D) OR (E)
    9  OF SUBDIVISION TWO OF SECTION FORTY-NINE-A OF THE NAVIGATION LAW  OR  BY
   10  OPERATION  OF  A SNOWMOBILE IN VIOLATION OF PARAGRAPH (B), (C) OR (D) OF
   11  SUBDIVISION ONE OF SECTION 25.24 OF THE PARKS, RECREATION  AND  HISTORIC
   12  PRESERVATION LAW OR BY OPERATION OF AN ALL TERRAIN VEHICLE AS DEFINED IN
   13  PARAGRAPH   (A)   OF  SUBDIVISION  ONE  OF  SECTION  TWENTY-TWO  HUNDRED
   14  EIGHTY-ONE OF THE VEHICLE AND TRAFFIC LAW IN  VIOLATION  OF  SUBDIVISION
   15  TWO,  THREE  OR FOUR OF SECTION ELEVEN HUNDRED NINETY-TWO OF THE VEHICLE
   16  AND TRAFFIC LAW.
   17    AGGRAVATED VEHICULAR ASSAULT IS A CLASS C FELONY.
   18    S 2. The penal law is amended by adding a new section 125.30  to  read
   19  as follows:
   20  S 125.30 VEHICULAR MURDER.
   21    A  PERSON  IS GUILTY OF VEHICULAR MURDER WHEN HE RECKLESSLY CAUSES THE
   22  DEATH OF ANOTHER PERSON BY OPERATION OF A VEHICLE IN VIOLATION OF SUBDI-
   23  VISION TWO, THREE OR FOUR OF SECTION ELEVEN HUNDRED  NINETY-TWO  OF  THE
   24  VEHICLE  AND TRAFFIC LAW OR BY OPERATION OF A VESSEL OR PUBLIC VESSEL IN

        EXPLANATION--Matter in ITALICS (underscored) is new; matter in brackets
                             [ ] is old law to be omitted.
                                                                  LBD01990-01-1

       S. 568                              2

    1  VIOLATION OF PARAGRAPH (B), (C), (D),  OR  (E)  OF  SUBDIVISION  TWO  OF
    2  SECTION  FORTY-NINE-A OF THE NAVIGATION LAW OR BY OPERATION OF A SNOWMO-
    3  BILE IN VIOLATION OF PARAGRAPH (B), (C) OR (D)  OF  SUBDIVISION  ONE  OF
    4  SECTION  25.24 OF THE PARKS, RECREATION AND HISTORIC PRESERVATION LAW OR
    5  BY OPERATION OF AN ALL TERRAIN VEHICLE AS DEFINED IN  PARAGRAPH  (A)  OF
    6  SUBDIVISION  ONE OF SECTION TWENTY-TWO HUNDRED EIGHTY-ONE OF THE VEHICLE
    7  AND TRAFFIC LAW IN VIOLATION  OF  SUBDIVISION  TWO,  THREE  OR  FOUR  OF
    8  SECTION ELEVEN HUNDRED NINETY-TWO OF THE VEHICLE AND TRAFFIC LAW.
    9    VEHICULAR MURDER IS A CLASS B FELONY.
   10    S 3. This act shall take effect on the first of November next succeed-
   11  ing the date on which it shall have become a law.
actClause: AN ACT to amend the penal law, in relation to aggravated vehicular assault and vehicular murder
